summary: Belgian mod, a race based on breton.
descriptionHtml:
this is my first mod, I\'m Belgian ... You guessed it?
The Belgians, a race a LITTLE CHEATED with useful skills.

They\'re based on breton race, but a few change.
They\'ve eyes and nose from other races.

Skills : Destruction, speech, lockpicking, two handed, alchemy, archery, pickpocket.

health base : 5000
magicka base : 5000
stamina base : 5000
Carryweight base : 30000

healthregen : 20
magickaregen : 23
staminaregen : 25

required :
Skyrim.esm
update.esm

compatible with all body mods

recommended :
Apachii sky hair http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168
unp replacer package http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20884


and sorry for my bad english...
author: floranais
